question: What will a typical day look like for my dog?
answer:
This will depend on the needs of your dog, but a typical day with us generally includes the below:
  • ◦ Morning walk or run
  • ◦ Breakfast
  • ◦ Morning socialization / play /enrichment
  • ◦ Nap time on their dog bed or crate
  • ◦ Lunchtime pee break and play /enrichment in the backyard
  • ◦ Nap time on their dog bed or crate
  • ◦ Evening walk or run
  • ◦ Dinner
  • ◦ Evening socialization / play / enrichment
  • ◦ Nighttime pee break in the backyard
  • ◦ Bedtime in their crate

question: How much will it cost?
answer:
Our boarding is done in 24-hour periods. Our current rate is $75 per 24 hours. Our holiday rate is $87 per 24 hours.

Drop-offs and pick-ups are between 8:00am ET and 8:00pm ET. Your scheduled drop-off time should be either earlier than or the same as your pick-up time, but there is a 2-hour grace period for pick-ups. Pick-up times past your grace period will incur an additional night's cost.

question: What is a Holiday Rate?
answer:
Our Holiday Rate ($87 per 24 hours) is the price for boarding during peak holiday periods. Boarding for any of the following dates will be priced at our Holiday Rate:
  • ◦ Jun 30 - Jul 2
  • ◦ Aug 4 - 7
  • ◦ Sep 1 - 4
  • ◦ Oct 6 - 9
  • ◦ Nov 10 - 12
  • ◦ Dec 22 - Jan 1

question: What should I bring?
answer:
We require you to bring:
  • ◦ Food
  • ◦ Treats (if your dog has food sensitivities/allergies)
  • ◦ A leash & collar
  • ◦ At least one toy or blanket with your pup’s smell on it
  • ◦ Any training tools you currently use with your dog (ex: halti, e-collar, etc)
Beyond the above, you can bring anything extra that will make you or your dog more comfortable! We have crates, beds, bowls, and toys for your pup while they're here.

question: Will I get updates while I'm away?
answer: Yes, we love updates! We post updates on our Instagram account, boutiqueboarding, so you can always view daily updates there! While the above account is accessible via most browsers without the need for an Instagram account, we’re also happy to send a daily update via email upon request.

question: Will my dog be crated?
answer:
Yes! While we work from home and are committed to the care and attention required of all dogs in our care, it is not possible for us to be attentive to them at all times. While boarding dogs are unsupervised, they will be crated. This includes crating overnight and occasional crating during the day if we are both out of the house.

Subject to any dietary restrictions, stuffed frozen Kong's or other durable toys are given regularly to help encourage a more positive and relaxed crating experience.

question: Will you bring my dog to dog parks?
answer: No, we do not bring any dogs in our care to dog parks. While dog parks can be fun and social at times, they can also be unpredictable and do not allow us to prioritize the safety and well-being of your dog. We also don’t allow interactions with any dogs not in our care and avoid all on-leash greetings.

question: How do I book?
answer:
Yay!! Our current booking process is:
  1. Send us your desired boarding dates by emailing us at boutiqueboardingco@gmail.com. We will confirm availability within 24 hours.
  2. Fill out our formal boarding form, which we'll send to you after confirming availability. This form allows us to gather essential information about your dog's needs and request required documents (such as vaccination records) to ensure the safety and well-being of all dogs in our care. We’ll review your form within 24 hours.
  3. We’ll schedule a call or meet & greet (depending on your preferences) to discuss any specific requirements or address any questions you may have.
  4. We’ll officially book your dog's stay with us!
Please note that we only book a maximum of two months in advance. If your desired dates fall beyond this timeframe, we are unable to accommodate your booking at this time.
